translated: A Certain Elder Nun🔽Since I went forth,

analyzed: yatas pabbajitā aha  na ā a charā saṅghāta mattam pi

translated: I didn’t attain even a moment of mental stillness.
Not having attained peace of mind,
I was overcome by lustful desire.
and then I entered the dwelling.
of the aggregates, sense-spheres, and elements.
I sat down in a secluded place.
and my divine eye was purified.
I had the knowledge of the minds of others,
and I attained the destruction of the pollutants.
I realized the six higher knowledges;
